answers.answer: I had high blood pressure going in but for my first trimester it was normal so i took no meds now its going back up again and i am at wk 14 doc put me on labetolol and sees me every 2 weeks instead of 4 hopefully meds will keep it stabilized enough im scared of preeclampsia myself tho ive never had it ive never had hbp with any of my other pregnancies either tho...congrats and good luck

question: Hi ladies. I'm 36 weeks 1 day and I went to the doctors today and I had high blood pressure. I had to go to the hospital for more tests. My blood pressure went back down a little and now I have to be monitored ever 2 days. I am just wondering if any other woman on here have had blood pressure problems. Does it go up slowly or did it just randomly go up? And if so how are you doing ?thank you!
title: High blood pressure
